description: Turn specific hashtags in a stream of fresh leads

outputDescription.tweetUrl: The URL of the Tweet related to those hashtags
outputDescription.twitterProfile: The URL of the author of that tweet
outputDescription.timestamp: The exact momoment the tweet was extracted by Phantombuster
outputDescription.query: The hashtags the tweet was extracted from (in case you used multiple hashtags)

spreadsheetUrl.label: Spreadsheet URL or Twitter hashtag(s) (?)
spreadsheetUrl.helper: Enter either a Google Spreadsheet URL or a CSV URL (make sure your file is publicly available) or a Twitter hashtag

columnName.label: Name of the column containing those hashtags (if your input is a spreadhsheet)
columnName.helper: If empty, the first column of your spreadsheet will be used

numberOfPostsPerLaunch.label: Number of tweets to extract per hashtag (?)
numberOfPostsPerLaunch.helper: By default the API will extract 25 tweets per launch
